member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Routing.VersionedAttributeRoutingConvention.ShouldMapController(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpControllerDescriptor)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the specified controller should be mapped using attribute routing conventions.
member.param: The controller descriptor to evaluate.
member.returns: True if the should be mapped as an OData controller; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: The default implementation always returns true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Routing.VersionedAttributeRoutingConvention.ShouldMapAction(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionDescriptor)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the specified action should be mapped using attribute routing conventions.
member.param: The action descriptor to evaluate.
member.returns: True if the should be mapped as an OData action or function; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: This method will match any OData action that explicitly or implicitly matches matches the API version applied to the associated model.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.OData.VersionedMetadataController
member.summary: Represents a controller for generating versioned OData service and metadata documents.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.OData.VersionedMetadataController.GetOptions
member.summary: Handles a request for the HTTP OPTIONS method.
member.returns: A result containing the response to the request.
member.remarks:
When a request is made with OPTIONS /$metadata, then this method will return the following HTTP headers:
Header Name Description
OData-Version The OData version supported by the endpoint.
api-supported-versions A comma-separated list of all supported API versions, if any.
api-deprecated-versions A comma-separated list of all supported API versions, if any.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SR.InvalidODataRouteOnAction
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The path template '{0}' on the action '{1}' in controller '{2}' is not a valid OData path template. {3}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SR.NullContainer
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The container built by the container builder must not be null..

member.name: P:Microsoft.SR.NullContainerBuilder
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The container builder created by the container builder factory must not be null..

member.name: P:Microsoft.SR.ObjectNotYetInitialized
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The object has not yet been initialized. Ensure that HttpConfiguration.EnsureInitialized() is called in the application's startup code after all other initialization code..

member.name: P:Microsoft.SR.RoutePrefixStartsWithSlash
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The OData route prefix '{0}' on the controller '{1}' starts with a '/'. Route prefixes cannot start with a '/'..
